description.oldValue:
Now educators can activate a class from the Microsoft Teams Classes LTI app within a LMS and no longer need to leave the LMS to activate a class. The new activation option is intuitive and easy to discover, with a notification banner for classes that need to be activated.
GA date: August CY2022
description.newValue:
Now educators can activate a class from
the Microsoft
Teams Classes LTI
app within a LMS and no longer need to
leave the LMS to activate a class. The new activation option is intuitive and easy
to discover,
with a notification
banner for classes that need to be activated.
